{{Infobox WCBB Team |name =
Lobo Women's Basketball
|logo = |logo_size = |university = [[University of New Mexico]] |conference = Mountain West Conference |conference_short = Mountain West |division = |city = Albuquerque |stateabb = NM |state = New Mexico |coach = [[Yvonnne Sanchez]] |tenure = 1st |arena = [[The Pit (arena)|The Pit]] |capacity = 17,200 |nickname = [[Lobo (New Mexico mascot)|Lobos]] |color1 = Cherry |color2 = White |color3 = Silver |hex1 = C10202 |hex2 = FFFFFF |hex3 = C0C0C0 |NCAAchampion = |NCAAfinalfour = |NCAA Sweet 16 = 2003 |NCAAsecondround = 2003, 2006 |NCAAtourneys =1998, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 |conference_tournament = 2003, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2008 |conference_season = 2004, 2005 |a_body=C10202 |a_pattern_b=_thinwhitesides |a_shorts=C10202 |a_pattern_s=_whitesides |h_body=C10202 |h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite |h_shorts=C10202 |h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |3_pattern_b=_thinredsides }} The '''University of New Mexico Lobos women's basketball''' team represents the [[University of New Mexico]] in the [[Mountain West Conference]] in the [[NCAA Division I]]. Yvonnne Sanchez was named head coach on April 22, 2011 replacing [[Don Flanagan]] who had been the head coach for 15 years. http://www.golobos.com/sports/w-baskbl/nm-w-baskbl-body.htmlhttp://www.golobos.com/sports/w-baskbl/mtt/flanagan_don00.html ==References== {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:New Mexico Lobos Women's Basketball}} [[Category:New Mexico Lobos basketball]]
